part_description: Contains multiple rectangular keys arranged in rows on a flat surface. Compact design with uniform key size. Positioned on an inclined plane for ergonomic use.
internal_interaction_description: The keys are individually placed to allow easy pressing. Each key interacts with the internal mechanism to register a keystroke when pressed. The layout ensures efficient typing with minimal movement between keys.
external_interaction_description: Designed to connect wirelessly to computers or tablets. Provides tactile feedback to the user. Can be used on various surfaces and interacts with software to input text and commands.
